description: A workflow specification connection type defines the properties that can be associated with a specific workflow specification connection.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration − Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The workflow specification connection type property(s) defines in part this workflow specification connection type..

contents.name: fromMultiplicity
contents.description: Defines the multiplicity of the “from” connection:

contents.name: toMultiplicity
contents.description: Defines the multiplicity of the “to” connection:
